cards.name: Amnesia
cards.flavor_text: "When one has witnessed the unspeakable, 'tis sometimes better to forget." —Vervamon the Elder
cards.oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards.

cards.name: Balance
cards.oracle_text: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

cards.name: Basal Thrull
cards.flavor_text:
"To create the first Thrulls, I only introduced alchemic elements into the Order's necromancy; Tourach's principles remained unchanged."
—Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder
cards.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Add {B}{B}.

cards.name: Basalt Monolith
cards.oracle_text:
This artifact doesn't untap during your untap step.
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.
{3}: Untap this artifact.

cards.name: Clergy of the Holy Nimbus
cards.oracle_text:
If this creature would be destroyed, regenerate it.
{1}: This creature can't be regenerated this turn. Only your opponents may activate this ability.

cards.name: Combat Medic
cards.flavor_text:
"Without Combat Medics, Icatia would probably not have withstood the forces of chaos as long as it did."
—*Sarpadian Empires*, vol. VI
cards.oracle_text: {1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

cards.name: Combat Medic
cards.flavor_text:
"Without Combat Medics, Icatia would probably not have withstood the forces of chaos as long as it did."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI*
cards.oracle_text: {1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

cards.name: Curse Artifact
cards.flavor_text: Voska feared the artifact had come too easily.
cards.oracle_text:
Enchant artifact
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, this Aura deals 2 damage to that player unless they sacrifice that artifact.

cards.name: Demonic Hordes
cards.flavor_text: Created to destroy Dominia, Demons can sometimes be bent to a more focused purpose.
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Destroy target land.
At the beginning of your upkeep, unless you pay {B}{B}{B}, tap this creature and sacrifice a land of an opponent's choice.

cards.name: Draconian Cylix
cards.flavor_text:
"There is no gain without sacrifice."
—Icatian proverb
cards.oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Discard a card at random: Regenerate target creature.

cards.name: Drowned
cards.flavor_text: We asked Captain Soll what became of the Serafina, but all he said was, "Ships that go down shouldn't come back up."
cards.oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate this creature.

cards.name: Electric Eel
cards.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, it deals 1 damage to you.
{R}{R}: This creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Elven Fortress
cards.flavor_text:
"Thallids are not ordinary enemies of flesh and bone and reason. They attack with no thought for our strength or of their own losses. I fear our Fortresses shall be overwhelmed."
—Kyliki of Havenwood
cards.oracle_text: {1}{G}: Target blocking creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Elvish Hunter
cards.flavor_text:
"Elves often tipped their arrows with a drug that caused a deep but harmless sleep."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. III*
cards.oracle_text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Elvish Scout
cards.flavor_text: Even one whose ears were closely tuned to the sounds of Havenwood could miss hearing a Scout move past.
cards.oracle_text: {G}, {T}: Untap target attacking creature you control. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn.

cards.name: Eternal Flame
cards.oracle_text: Eternal Flame deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker and half X damage, rounded up, to you, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

cards.name: Farrelite Priest
cards.flavor_text: Although their methods were often brutal, Farrel's followers believed in the preservation of justice and virtue.
cards.oracle_text: {1}: Add {W}. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice this creature at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Feral Thallid
cards.flavor_text:
"Born and bred of fungus, Thallids were nearly impossible to kill."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. I*
cards.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on this creature.
Remove three spore counters from this creature: Regenerate this creature.

cards.name: Gaea's Touch
cards.oracle_text:
{0}: You may put a basic Forest card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
Sacrifice this enchantment: Add {G}{G}.

cards.name: Giant Shark
cards.oracle_text:
This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature that has been dealt damage this turn, this creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice this creature.

cards.name: Goblin Grenade
cards.flavor_text:
"I don't suppose we could teach them to *throw* the cursed things?"
—Ivra Jursdotter
cards.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.

cards.name: Goblin Kites
cards.oracle_text: {R}: Target creature you control with toughness 2 or less gains flying until end of turn. Flip a coin at the beginning of the next end step. If you lose the flip, sacrifice that creature.

cards.name: Granite Gargoyle
cards.flavor_text:
"While most overworlders fortunately don't realize this, Gargoyles can be most delicious, providing you have the appropriate tools to carve them."
—The Underworld Cookbook, by Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: High Tide
cards.flavor_text:
"May Svyelun and her tides favor you."
—Traditional Merfolk blessing
cards.oracle_text: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps an Island for mana, that player adds an additional {U}.

cards.name: Holy Light
cards.flavor_text: "Bathed in hallowed light, the infidels looked upon the impurities of their souls and despaired." —*The Book of Tal*
cards.oracle_text: Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Homarid Spawning Bed
cards.oracle_text: {1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a blue creature: Create X 1/1 blue Camarid creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's mana value.

cards.name: Hornet Cobra
cards.flavor_text:
"Then inch by inch out of the grass rose up the head and spread hood of Nag, the big black cobra, and he was five feet long from tongue to tail."
—Rudyard Kipling, *The Jungle Books*
cards.oracle_text: First strike

cards.name: Hymn to Tourach
cards.flavor_text:
"The eerie, wailing Hymn caused insanity even in hardened warriors."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. II*
cards.oracle_text: Target player discards two cards at random.

cards.name: Hymn to Tourach
cards.flavor_text: Members of the Order often played the Hymn on instruments made from their victims' bones.
cards.oracle_text: Target player discards two cards at random.

cards.name: Icatian Infantry
cards.flavor_text:
"Valiant Icatia was the last of the Sarpadian empires to fall. Its faithful soldiers defended their cities to the very end."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI*
cards.oracle_text:
{1}: This creature gains first strike until end of turn.
{1}: This creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

cards.name: Icatian Infantry
cards.flavor_text: Although they had long been concerned about the Order of the Ebon Hand, the Icatians faced an even greater threat from Goblin and Orcish raiders.
cards.oracle_text:
{1}: This creature gains first strike until end of turn.
{1}: This creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

cards.name: Icatian Moneychanger
cards.oracle_text:
This creature enters with three credit counters on it.
When this creature enters, it deals 3 damage to you.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a credit counter on this creature.
Sacrifice this creature: You gain 1 life for each credit counter on this creature. Activate only during your upkeep.

cards.name: Jandor's Ring
cards.oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Discard the last card you drew this turn: Draw a card.

cards.name: Kudzu
cards.oracle_text:
Enchant land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it. That land's controller may attach this Aura to a land of their choice.

cards.name: Mind Twist
cards.oracle_text: Target player discards X cards at random.

cards.name: Orcish Spy
cards.flavor_text:
"You idiot! Never let the spies mingle with the Orcish regulars after completing a mission. Now we'll never get them to fight!"
—General Khurzog
cards.oracle_text: {T}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library.

cards.name: Roc of Kher Ridges
cards.flavor_text: We encountered a valley topped with immense boulders and eerie rock formations. Suddenly one of these boulders toppled from its perch and sprouted gargantuan wings, casting a shadow of darkness and sending us fleeing in terror.
cards.oracle_text: Flying

cards.name: Rock Hydra
cards.oracle_text:
This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
For each 1 damage that would be dealt to this creature, if it has a +1/+1 counter on it, remove a +1/+1 counter from it and prevent that 1 damage.
{R}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to this creature this turn.
{R}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Activate only during your upkeep.

cards.name: Scarwood Goblins
cards.flavor_text: Larger and more cunning than most Goblins, Scarwood Goblins are thankfully found only in isolated pockets.

cards.name: Scarwood Hag
cards.oracle_text:
{G}{G}{G}{G}, {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
{T}: Target creature loses forestwalk until end of turn.

cards.name: Skull of Orm
cards.flavor_text: Though lifeless, the Skull still possessed a strange power over the flow of magic.
cards.oracle_text: {5}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Squire
cards.flavor_text:
"Of twenty yeer of age he was, I gesse.
Of his stature he was of even lengthe,
And wonderly deliver, and greete of strengthe."
—Geoffrey Chaucer, *The Canterbury Tales*

cards.name: Standing Stones
cards.oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

cards.name: Thelonite Monk
cards.flavor_text:
"As the climate worsened, some Thelonites turned to fertilizing with fresh blood in an attempt to keep Havenwood alive and growing."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. III*
cards.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a green creature: Target land becomes a Forest. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

cards.name: Thorn Thallid
cards.flavor_text:
"The danger in cultivating massive plants caught the Elves by surprise."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. III*
cards.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on this creature.
Remove three spore counters from this creature: It deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.name: Vodalian Mage
cards.flavor_text:
"Vodalian Mages are remarkable. Their merchants bring them arcane lore and devices from across the seas."
—Lydia Wynforth, Mayor of Trokair
cards.oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

cards.name: Wall of Caltrops
cards.flavor_text: "Ow! Ow ow ow! Oooh, ow, OW!"
cards.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever this creature blocks a creature, if at least one other Wall creature is blocking that creature and no non-Wall creatures are blocking that creature, this creature gains banding until end of turn. (If any creatures with banding you control are blocking a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by.)

cards.name: Water Wurm
cards.oracle_text: This creature gets +0/+1 as long as an opponent controls an Island.

cards.name: Worms of the Earth
cards.flavor_text: The ground collapsed, leaving nothing but the great Worms' mucous residues.
cards.oracle_text:
Players can't play lands.
Lands can't enter the battlefield.
At the beginning of each upkeep, any player may sacrifice two lands of their choice or have this enchantment deal 5 damage to that player. If a player does either, destroy this enchantment.

cards.name: Zelyon Sword
cards.flavor_text: No sheath shall hold what finds its home in flesh.
cards.oracle_text:
You may choose not to untap this artifact during your untap step.
{3}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 for as long as this artifact remains tapped.
